thread.title: Jana Partners Take Sole Share Stake In Facebook, GM

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Jana Partners Take Sole Share Stake In Facebook, GM

organizations.name: jana partners take sole share stake in facebook

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Jana Partners:
* TAKE SOLE SHARE STAKE OF 473,526 CLASS A SHARES IN FACEBOOK - SEC FILING
* MORE THAN HALVES SOLE SHARE STAKE IN DOWDUPONT TO ABOUT 1.2 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* TAKES SOLE SHARE STAKE OF 1.3 MILLION SHARES IN GM - SEC FILING
* CUTS SOLE SHARE STAKE IN PANDORA MEDIA BY 47.5 PERCENT TO 8.6 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* DISSOLVES SOLE SHARE STAKE IN ORACLE - SEC FILING
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC. 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT. 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2Er4MQh )
Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2igoLbb )
